DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of efficacy and safety of SBG vs placebo in the treatment of chronic diabetic foot ulcers.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study of Soluble Beta-1,3/1,6-glucan (SBG) Versus Placebo in Chronic Diabetic Foot Ulcers
DOC.detailed_description: The objective of this study is to evaluate efficacy and safety of soluble beta-1,3/1,6-glucan (SBG) on chronic diabetic foot ulcers.
DOC.criteria: Patients with chronic diabetic foot ulcer Insufficient nutritional status, renal function or diabetes control
